caption: Threat Intelligence
description: The normalized information pertaining to a behavior, campaign, and/or specific threat actor related to an indicator, Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) analysis, or a generic security finding or report.
name: threat_intelligence

desc.caption: Analysis Description
desc.description: The description of the specific behavior, campaign, threat actor, or the overall threat intelligence analysis or report.

first_seen_time.description: The initial discovery time of the given subject of the threat intelligence analysis, if known.

last_seen_time.description: The latest time of a given subject of the threat intelligence analysis was encountered, if known.

name.caption: Subject Name
name.description: The common name or label for a behavior, campaign, threat actor, or the name of the overall threat intelligence analysis or report.

objective.description: The primary goal, objective, desired outcome, or intended effect of a campaign or threat actor relevant to a threat intelligence analysis or report. E.g., ransomware, cyber warfare, industrial espionage, disruption, political damage, etc.

src_url.description: The URL of the threat intelligence analysis or report.

tags.description: Tags or labels related to a threat intelligence analysis or report.

type.caption: Subject Type
type.description: The subject for a threat intelligence analysis or report, normalized to the caption of the type_id value. In the case of Other, it is defined by the event source.

type_id.caption: Subject Type ID
type_id.description: The normalized value for the subject of a given threat intelligence analysis or report.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The subject is ambiguous or unknown.

1.caption: Behavior
1.description: Specific behaviors or tradecraft is described.

2.caption: Campaign
2.description: A specific threat campaign is described.

3.caption: Threat Actor
3.description: A specific threat group - regardless of its capabilities or sophistication - is described.

uid.caption: Subject UID
uid.description: The machine-readable or unique ID for a behavior, campaign, threat actor, or the name of the overall threat intelligence analysis or report.

vendor_name.description: The provider or vendor of the threat intelligence analysis or report.
